data.name: CitizenAbility
data.value: You have no special traits at night.

data.name: CitizenRole
data.value: You are a regular person who believes in truth and justice.

data.name: CounselorAbility
data.value: You can investigate one player each night.

data.name: CounselorRole
data.value: You are a counselor to the boss of a crime family.

data.name: CultistAbility
data.value: You speak together at night with other Cultists. However, you can only surmise who is your leader.

data.name: CultistRole
data.value: You are a believer of a shadowy cult, secretly attempting to convert the town to darkness.

data.name: CultusLeaderAbility
data.value: You may attempt to convert one person to a Cultist each night and hear everything what your minions talk about. You stay unknown for them.

data.name: CultusLeaderRole
data.value: You are the leader of a shadowy cult, secretly attempting to convert the town to darkness.

data.name: CultusT
data.value: Cultus

data.name: CultusTeam
data.value: You belong to CULTUS and want all roles to be dead or converted to Cultists.

data.name: CursedAbility
data.value: You have no special traits at night. If you got killed at this time you will become a Zombie but you are not sure whether you want to.

data.name: CursedRole
data.value: You are a regular person who believes in justice and even do not suspect your soul is cursed.

data.name: DetectiveAbility
data.value: You can investigate one person's role each night.

data.name: DetectiveRole
data.value: You are a skilled tracker, learning important information on behalf of the town.

data.name: DoctorAbility
data.value: You can visit someone at night to save them if someone tries to kill them.

data.name: DoctorRole
data.value: You are a secret surgeon skilled in trauma care.

data.name: DriverAbility
data.value: You can swap two players at night, making actions that target the first player instead target the second player and vice versa.

data.name: DriverRole
data.value: You are a disgruntled licensed transport driver.

data.name: GodfatherAbility
data.value: You may attempt to recruit one person to your clan each night.

data.name: GodfatherRole
data.value: You are a the capofamiglia of the town's organized mafia syndicate

data.name: MafiaAbility
data.value: You can kill one player each night. If there are several mafiosos then only the mafioso will go after his target.

data.name: MafiaRole
data.value: You are a lowly soldato for one of the Don's borgata.

data.name: MafiaT
data.value: Mafia

data.name: MafiaTeam
data.value: You belong to MAFIA and want to kill off the Town and everyone else who would oppose you.

data.name: MasonAbility
data.value: You may collaborate with other Masons at night through the secret Mason night chat.

data.name: MasonRole
data.value: You are a member of a secret society.

data.name: NeutralT
data.value: Neutral

data.name: PolicemanAbility
data.value: You can check one player each night for criminal activity.

data.name: PolicemanRole
data.value: You are a member of law enforcement, forced into hiding because of the threat of murder.

data.name: ProstituteAbility
data.value: You can block someone's role at night, canceling their night abilities. If you got recruited by Godfather you become a Whore.

data.name: ProstituteRole
data.value: You are a scantily-clad escort, working in secret.

data.name: PsychicAbility
data.value: You may collaborate with other Undeads at night and also speak with decedents.

data.name: PsychicRole
data.value: You are a spiritual master whose soul is connected with decedents.

data.name: RecruitAbility
data.value: You have no special traits at night. If you got recruited at this time you will become a Mafia.

data.name: RecruitRole
data.value: You are a regular person who believes in truth and justice, and hope you will find a good job ever.

data.name: SerialKillerAbility
data.value: You can kill one target at night who you want to.

data.name: SerialKillerRole
data.value: You are a deranged criminal who hates the world.

data.name: SerialKillerTeam
data.value: You do not belong to anyone and want to be the last person left alive.

data.name: SurgeonAbility
data.value: You can visit someone at night to save them if someone tries to kill them.

data.name: SurgeonRole
data.value: You are a secret surgeon skilled in trauma care behalf of the Mafia.

data.name: TerroristAbility
data.value: You may perform a killing spree, planting a bomb at someone's house one night, killing anyone who visits that player at the same time. You cannot be healed if you do this.

data.name: TerroristRole
data.value: You are a crazed spree killer who thinks the world should be destroyed.

data.name: TerroristTeam
data.value: You do not belong to anyone and want to kill everybody including yourself over this world.

data.name: TownT
data.value: Town

data.name: TownTeam
data.value: You belong to TOWN and want to lynch every criminal and evildoer.

data.name: UndeadT
data.value: Undead

data.name: UndeadTeam
data.value: You belong to UNDEAD and want all players to be dead or converted to Zombie.

data.name: VigilanteAbility
data.value: You may kill one target at night according how many bullets left in you cartridge.

data.name: VigilanteRole
data.value: You are a dirty cop who will ignore the law and order to enact justice.

data.name: WhoreAbility
data.value: You can perform roleblock one player each night.

data.name: WhoreRole
data.value: You are a dancer working for organized crime.

data.name: WitchAbility
data.value: You may force one person to use their night ability on a target of your choice.

data.name: WitchRole
data.value: You are a malicious mystic who uses their manipulative powers for evil.

data.name: WitchTeam
data.value: You do not belong to anyone and want to survive and see the town lose.

data.name: ZombieAbility
data.value: You can try to ressurect one person who was killed at this night and turn him into a Zombie.

data.name: ZombieRole
data.value: You are a mystically survived person who still have consciousness.
